name: Five Nights At Winston's Playhouse
description:
This is the second of three games that will tell the story of what happened between Freddy Fazbear's Pizzaria Simulator and FNaF VR: Help Wanted.

How to Play?:
Click the monitor to check cams
Click the doorways to check the halls
Click the heater button to turn it on
Click the flash button to use flash

Do not wear headphones while playing this, unless you want your ears to explode.

My Youtube channel, where I play this: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyAwuR21ZhL_mB67A8FtNaA?

Credit to Scott Cawthon for the original idea.

Play this on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/398447036/

My Scratch Account: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/ThoseFiveNights24/
